about.title: About XIV Dye Tools
about.builtWith: Built with TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS

footer.createdBy: Created by Flash Galatine (Balmung) for the FFXIV community
footer.disclaimer: FINAL FANTASY XIV © 2010-2025 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.
footer.notAffiliated: XIV Dye Tools is a fan-made application and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Square Enix.

harmony.title: Color Harmony Explorer
harmony.subtitle: Discover harmonious color combinations using color theory. Select a base color to generate classic harmony types.

matcher.title: Color Matcher
matcher.subtitle: Upload an image or select a color to find the closest matching FFXIV dyes.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Checker
accessibility.subtitle: Check how dye combinations appear to players with different types of color vision.

comparison.title: Dye Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Compare dyes side-by-side to see color differences and find the perfect match.

gradient.title: Gradient Builder
gradient.subtitle: Build smooth color gradients between dyes and find intermediate options.

mixer.title: Dye Mixer
mixer.subtitle: Blend two dyes together to find FFXIV dyes that match the mixed color.

presets.title: Preset Palettes
presets.subtitle: Explore curated dye palettes for jobs, seasons, events, and more.
presets.communityDescription: Discover and share color palettes created by the FFXIV community

budget.title: Budget Suggestions
budget.subtitle: Discover cheaper alternatives to expensive dyes. Set your budget and find similar colors that won't break the bank.

character.title: Character Matcher
character.subtitle: Find FFXIV dyes that match your character's hair, eyes, skin, and other customization colors.
character.noColorSelected: Select a color from the grid to find matching dyes

config.perceptualMatchingDesc: Uses DeltaE for perceptually accurate color matching
config.hueMatchingDesc: Uses hue angles for artistic color harmony
config.dragThresholdTooltip: Lower values make dragging easier, higher values make clicking easier
config.mixingRgbDesc: Additive light mixing. Blue + Yellow = Gray.
config.mixingLabDesc: Perceptually uniform blending. Blue + Yellow = Pink.
config.mixingOklabDesc: Modern perceptual space. Blue + Yellow = Cyan.
config.mixingRybDesc: Gossett-Chen paint simulation. Blue + Yellow = Olive.
config.mixingHslDesc: Hue-based blending in HSL color space.
config.colorSpaceRgbDesc: Linear interpolation. Creates gray midpoints between colors.
config.colorSpaceHsvDesc: Follows the color wheel. Vibrant transitions, may shift hue.
config.colorSpaceOklchDesc: Modern perceptual space. Best overall gradient quality.
config.colorSpaceLchDesc: Cylindrical LAB. Good hue preservation with perceptual lightness.
config.matchingOklabDesc: Modern perceptual space. Best balance of accuracy and simplicity.
config.matchingHyabDesc: Hybrid algorithm optimized for large color differences. Best for palette matching.
config.matchingCiede2000Desc: Industry standard perceptual formula with correction factors.
config.matchingCie76Desc: Simple LAB Euclidean distance. Fast but less accurate.
config.matchingRgbDesc: Basic RGB Euclidean distance. Fastest but least perceptually accurate.
config.matchingOklchWeightedDesc: OKLCH with customizable lightness, chroma, and hue weights.
config.resetSettingsConfirm: Reset all settings to defaults? This cannot be undone.
config.clearDyesConfirm: Clear all selected dyes across all tools?
config.clearFavoritesConfirm: Clear all favorite dyes? This cannot be undone.
config.clearPalettesConfirm: Clear all saved palettes? This cannot be undone.
config.performanceModeDesc: Reduce animations and effects for better performance on slower devices
config.analyticsDesc: Help improve XIV Dye Tools by sharing anonymous usage data
config.importError: Failed to import settings. Please check the file format.

harmony.simpleDesc: Strict harmony with precise dye matching
harmony.expandedDesc: Additional similar dyes per harmony color
harmony.companionDyesDesc: Choose how many additional companion dyes to show
harmony.selectDyePrompt: Select a base dye to generate color harmonies
harmony.selectBaseColor: Select a base color to generate harmonies
harmony.slotsFull: All slots are full. Select one to replace:
harmony.selectColorMessage: Enter a hex color or pick a dye to generate harmonies.

types.complementaryDesc: Colors directly opposite on the color wheel for maximum contrast
types.analogousDesc: Colors adjacent on the wheel for a harmonious, unified look
types.triadicDesc: Three colors evenly spaced at 120° for vibrant, balanced palettes
types.splitComplementaryDesc: Base color plus two colors adjacent to its complement
types.tetradicDesc: Four colors in a rectangular pattern for rich combinations
types.squareDesc: Four colors evenly spaced at 90° for dynamic variety
types.monochromaticDesc: Variations of a single hue for subtle, cohesive looks
types.compoundDesc: A mix of complementary and analogous colors
types.shadesDesc: Different shades and tints of the base color

matcher.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here
matcher.orClickSelect: or click to select a file
matcher.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP
matcher.supportedFormatsWithSize: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, WebP, GIF. Maximum size: 20MB
matcher.privacyNoteFull: Privacy: Images never leave your browser. All processing happens locally.
matcher.privacyNoticeHtml: Privacy Protected: Photos and images are processed locally in your browser and never uploaded to any server. Learn more
matcher.privacyMessage: Photos and images are processed locally in your browser and never uploaded to any server.
matcher.pasteHint: Tip: Paste an image using Ctrl+V (Cmd+V on Mac)
matcher.sampleSizeDesc: Larger sizes produce more accurate color matching but ignore fine details
matcher.clickToSample: Click on the image to sample a color. Drag to sample a region. Use zoom controls or Shift + scroll to adjust view.
matcher.paletteModeDesc: Extract dominant colors from entire image
matcher.colorCountDesc: How many dominant colors to extract
matcher.noImageForPalette: Please upload an image first to extract palette
matcher.uploadPrompt: Upload an image to start matching
matcher.orEnterHex: Or enter a hex color manually
matcher.extractPaletteDesc: Extract dominant colors from the entire image
matcher.imageTooLarge: Image too large to save for later
matcher.dropImageHere: Drop image here or click to upload

accessibility.selectUpTo: Select up to {count} dyes to check accessibility
accessibility.selectDyesToSeeAnalysis: Select dyes to see accessibility analysis
accessibility.verySimular: Very similar - may be hard to distinguish
accessibility.somewhatSimilar: Similar - some users may have difficulty distinguishing
accessibility.redGreenWarning: Red-green colorblind users may see this as a different color
accessibility.tritanopiaWarning: May be hard to see for tritanopia (blue-yellow colorblindness)
accessibility.achromatopsiaWarning: May be hard to see for total colorblindness
accessibility.selectTwoDyes: Select at least 2 dyes to see comparisons

comparison.selectToSeeAnalysis: Select 2 or more dyes to see analysis
comparison.selectAtLeastTwoDyes: Select at least 2 dyes to compare

matrix.title: Color Distance Matrix
matrix.description: Lower values indicate more similar colors. Green = very close, Yellow = moderate, Red = very different

mixer.stepsHint: More steps provide a smoother transition but may result in more repeated dyes
mixer.colorSpaceHint: HSV typically produces more natural-looking transitions. RGB is linear but more mathematically straightforward.
mixer.noSavedGradientsHint: No saved gradients yet. Click "Save Gradient" to create one!
mixer.selectDyesToSave: Please select 2 dyes to save gradient
mixer.copyUrlFailed: Failed to copy URL. Please try again.
mixer.dyeNotFoundInDb: One or more dyes not found in database
mixer.distanceExplanation: Distance measures how closely the matched dye's color compares to the theoretical color at that transition point.
mixer.distanceHint: Lower distance = better match. A distance of 0 means a perfect match.
mixer.clickStopHint: Click a stop marker to highlight the corresponding dye
mixer.selectStartEndDyes: Select start and end dyes to create a color transition
mixer.selectTwoDyesToMix: Select two dyes to blend and find matching colors
mixer.slotsFullReplacing: Both slots full. Replacing first dye.

gradient.setStartAndEnd: Set a start and end color to generate gradient steps
gradient.clickPlusButtons: Select dyes from the Color Palette to set gradient colors
gradient.sameDyeWarning: Start and end dyes are the same. Select different dyes for a gradient.
gradient.slotsFull: All slots are full. Select one to replace:

dyeSelector.gridAriaLabel: Dye selection grid. Use arrow keys to navigate, Enter or Space to select.
dyeSelector.noResultsHint: Try a different search term or category

filters.title: Dye Filters
filters.excludeMetallicDesc: Hide dyes with "Metallic" in the name
filters.excludePastelDesc: Hide dyes with "Pastel" in the name
filters.excludeCosmicDesc: Hide dyes from Cosmic Exploration & Cosmic Fortunes

marketBoard.title: Market Board
marketBoard.clearingCache: Clearing cache and fetching new prices...
marketBoard.refreshError: Error refreshing prices. Please try again.
marketBoard.offlineWarning: You are offline. Cannot refresh prices.

budget.selectTargetToStart: Select a target dye to find affordable alternatives
budget.distanceDesc: Higher values show more alternatives, lower values show closer matches

errors.invalidRgb: RGB values must be between 0 and 255.
errors.databaseLoadFailed: Failed to load dye database. Please refresh the page.
errors.apiFailed: Failed to fetch data from market board.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.imageLoadFailed: Failed to load image. Please ensure it is a valid image file.
errors.imageTooLarge: Image file is too large. Maximum size is 20MB.
errors.failedToLoadSubmissions: Failed to load submissions. Please try again.
errors.failedToDeletePreset: Failed to delete preset. Please try again.
errors.submitPresetFailed: Failed to submit preset. Please try again.
errors.saveChangesFailed: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
errors.deletePresetFailed: Failed to delete preset. Please try again.
errors.presetDataMissing: Unable to delete: preset data missing
errors.presetNoApiId: Unable to delete: preset has no API ID
errors.noPixelsInRegion: No pixels to analyze in selected region
errors.storageFailed: Failed to save settings. Storage may be full.

welcome.title: Welcome to XIV Dye Tools
welcome.intro: Find the perfect dyes for your FFXIV glamours! Explore our tools below:
welcome.tip1: Click tool names in the header to switch between tools
welcome.tip2: Prices are from Universalis (live market data)
welcome.tip3: Your settings are saved locally in your browser

palette.saveHint: Click the bookmark icon on any harmony card to save it
palette.name: Palette Name
palette.importFailed: No valid palettes found in file
palette.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this palette?

camera.title: Camera Capture
camera.instructions: Position your subject and click capture
camera.privacyNotice: Your camera stream is processed locally. No images are sent to our servers.

offline.banner: You are offline. Some features may be limited.

collections.favoritesEmptyHint: Click the ★ on any dye to add it to your favorites
collections.collectionsEmptyHint: Create a collection to organize your dyes
collections.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?

prompt.title: Quick Tour
prompt.message: Would you like a quick tour of this tool?

baseColor.title: Select a Base Dye
baseColor.description: Choose a dye from the color palette to use as your base. Click any color swatch to select it.

filters.title: Search & Filter
filters.description: Use the search box to find dyes by name, or filter by type: Metallic, Pastel, Dark, or Vibrant.

favorites.title: Your Favorites
favorites.description: Star any dye to save it to your favorites. Click the star on a swatch to add or remove it.

toolBanner.title: Switch Tools
toolBanner.description: Click any tool icon to switch between different features: Color Harmony, Extractor, Comparison, and more!

palette.title: Color Palette
palette.description: Select dyes from the palette on the right to use in color extraction and matching.

settings.title: Extraction Settings
settings.description: Toggle options like Vibrancy Boost to enhance color extraction from images.

maxColors.title: Max Colors
maxColors.description: Adjust the slider to set how many colors to extract from your image.

displayOptions.title: Display Options
displayOptions.description: Customize which color values are shown: Hex, RGB, HSV, Lab, prices, and more.

select.title: Select Dyes
select.description: Click dyes from the palette to add them to the comparison. You can compare up to 4 dyes.

displayOptions.title: Display Options
displayOptions.description: Choose which color formats and metadata to display in the comparison view.

favorites.title: Use Favorites
favorites.description: Quickly access your favorite dyes to add them to comparisons.

selectColors.title: Select Colors
selectColors.description: Choose dyes from the palette to mix together. The mixer will blend them to create new colors.

mixingMode.title: Mixing Mode
mixingMode.description: Select the color mixing algorithm: Spectral, RYB, OKLab, Lab, HSL, or RGB blending.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Adjust how many matching dye results are shown for each mixed color.

displayOptions.title: Display Options
displayOptions.description: Customize which color values and metadata are shown for mixed colors.

select.title: Select Dyes
select.description: Choose dyes from the palette to check how they appear with different types of color vision.

visionTypes.title: Vision Types
visionTypes.description: Toggle which color vision simulations to show: Deuteranopia, Protanopia, Tritanopia, or Achromatopsia.

displaySettings.title: Display Settings
displaySettings.description: Configure display options for the accessibility checker view.

preset.loginPrompt: Log in to submit presets and vote
preset.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.
preset.loginToVote: Login with Discord or XIVAuth to vote for this preset
preset.signInToViewSubmissions: Sign in to view your submissions
preset.noSubmissionsYet: You haven't submitted any presets yet.
preset.submitPresetHint: Click "Submit Preset" above to share your color palettes!
preset.alreadyVoted: You already voted for this preset
preset.onlyEditOwn: You can only edit your own presets
preset.duplicateFound: This dye combination already exists as "{name}"
preset.duplicateWithVote: This dye combination already exists as "{name}". Your vote has been added!
preset.submittedPendingReview: Preset submitted! It will appear after moderator review.
preset.editPendingReview: Changes saved! Your edit is pending moderator review.

noSearchResults.title: No dyes match "{query}"
noSearchResults.description: Try checking your spelling or search for a category like "purple" or "red".

filteredOut.title: All suggestions were filtered out
filteredOut.description: Your current filters are hiding all matching dyes. Try adjusting your filter settings.

noPrice.description: This dye may not be tradeable or Universalis doesn't have recent data for this server.

noHarmony.title: No harmony suggestions
noHarmony.description: Select a base dye to generate color harmony suggestions.

noImage.title: No image loaded
noImage.description: Upload an image to start matching colors from it.

loading.title: Loading...
loading.description: Please wait while we fetch the data.

resultCard.slotsFull: All slots are full. Select one to replace:
